text: Jonathan Howsmon Davis (born January 18, 1971) is an American singer, songwriter, and music maker. He is also known as JD or JDevil. He is the singer for Korn. Korn is an American nu metal band. It is one of the first nu metal bands. Davis helped make Korn in 1993. Davis has worked with many other music makers, such as Sepultura, Limp Bizkit, and Q-Tip. He has made many different types of music. Davis can play the guitar, drums, bagpipes, piano, clarinet, violin, and upright bass. He makes electronic music as JDevil. == References == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American heavy metal singers Category:Singers from Bakersfield, California Category:Writers from Bakersfield, California Category:American singer- songwriters Category:Musicians from Bakersfield, California
title: Jonathan Davis
